Detailed Description

Secret share key data interface (abstract interface).

Implementations of this interface are used to generate a cryptography key from data supplied by the implementation. The key is protected by splitting it to shares using the Shamir Secret Sharing algorithm. The buckets define groups of attributes which must remain the same across usages, up to the threshold defined in each bucket.
